Primordial Entities

Primordial Entities are those entities which exist outside of any [creation:Creation] and express aparent agency or complex behaviour independant of the Primordial Elements Mana and Anicca. Such entities include Gods, and the Charon. These entities typically emerge within Solitude, though Gods often fold themselves into a pocket of Solitude, and the Charon reside in their own primordial plane.
